advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Speakle is an outstanding app that offers an Anonymous social network platform where users can anonymously chat, confess, share thoughts and secrets with all other Speakle users. No need to add friends or follow strangers to share thoughts or give your opinion. Speak you mind and people will be reading your posts. Speakle is the best place to be, as it keeps your identity undisclosed while you share your emotions and text anonymously amidst strangers. Also, you can read other user's posts on Speakle, as well as like comment and share those posts. 

Speakle offers a new Drop feature, where users can drop posts in specific locations within a chosen radius of 50, 100, 250 or 500 yards. Other users will be able to discover and read these posts only when they arrive within the radius. Users are able to accumulate these drops in the feed as they go places.


Why Use Speakle:

- Tell a story, ask a question, share your feelings and no one will mind what you just said. 

- With no character limit, you can pour your heart out.

- You will go beyond the comfort zone of friends and family and explore a world of strangers.

-Share anything and everything that you wish to, as you will be posting Anonymously.

- Get opinions, likes and comments from strangers on topics that you really don't wish to discuss with friends and family.

- You can comment, discuss and share your opinions and beliefs on other people's post. Helping strangers is a good idea. Isn't it!

Let's Speakle Now!
releaseNotes:
-bug fixes
-no sign up or log in process
-new drop feature
-UI changes
